categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Besk was a male Human officer of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Cold War. Stationed in the Dorn Base on Hoth, he also handled the requisitioning of armor upgrades.

Officer Besk appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Mods Vendor for Imperial players on Hoth. With the release of Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015, he was removed from the game along with the rest of the Mods Vendors.
